data.title: Awesome hospitality and good beer
data.text: Great local feel.  Very hospitable family run joint.  It's very clear that the family legitimately loves working together and is super proud of what they've accomplished.  Great beer selection and fun place to hear local tunes!  A definite must visit on trips to Clovis/Fresno area!

data.title: Microbrew tasting at it's best
data.text:
559 Local is the tasting room for the first microbrewery in Clovis, CA and is located in the heart of Old Town Clovis.  There are eight different German style beers on tap and available for tasting.  I found Bourbon Barrel Ale and the Clovis Independence Ale to be my favorites.  Besides the tasting bar, there is ample space to sit and enjoy a pint of your favorite beer.

The 559 Local is listed as a restaurant but should be listed as a bar as they do not serve food.

data.title: BOTIQUE BREWERY WITH GREAT BEER
data.text: 599 opened about a year ago.  I have seen them progress and greatly improve over the year.  The have wonderful tasting beer.

data.title: Friendly family owned local brewery
data.text: A naturally fun Old Town Clovis vibe at this cozy creative brewery. They use the featured valley fruits and grains to brew in their beers. Fun to try the taster tray. The family runs and works the business. They will make you feel very at home. Open Thurs - Sat. Bottled are featured at several local businesses. Try it!

data.title: GROSS
data.text: I am a beer fan.  That being said, I am not a fan of this place.  Most of the bers tasted oxidized or burned malt.  I have bough 2 of their beers from a store as well, one of which was flat, and one of which tasted like vinegar...  Gross

data.title: Family-friendly tasting room
data.text: We love everything about 559 Local.  It's location can't be beat, the beers are tasty, and the fact that it's a family run business tops it all!  They support the community with fundraisers, highlight local musicians, and serve bratwurst from Fresno State.  What a great addition to Clovis.

data.title: From the TAP - GREAT brew!
data.text: We tried all the beers on tap...each one unique and tasty. Small looking from the outside, but once you step into this place it opens up and makes you feel at home. Very quaint and classy! Seating places are throughout the place, never did we feel like it was crowded, though the place was bustling with lovers of fresh tap brew. A must stop for those that like a classy place to have a good brew.
